## ü§ù Adding New [Items]

[Call to action - discovered a new pattern/algorithm/etc?]

**We want to capture it!**

### Process for Adding

1. **[Step one]** - [Details about first step]
   - [Sub-detail]
   - [Sub-detail]

2. **[Step two]** - [Details about second step]
   - [Sub-detail]

3. **Assign next number**
   - Check this index for last [PREFIX] number
   - Create `[DOMAIN]-[CAT]-###-[SUBCAT]-[name].ext`

4. **[Step three]** - [Details about third step]
   - [Sub-detail]
   - [Sub-detail]

5. **Verify all links and claims** - Cross-verify before documenting
   - Verify every file path actually exists before linking
   - Verify implementations contain what you claim they do
   - Use Future: prefix for planned but not yet existing artifacts
   - Don't link to non-existent directories or files

6. **Update this index**
   - Add to Available [Items] section
   - Update cross-project usage if applicable
   - Link all related artifacts

**Standards to follow:**

- [[CWS-STD-001: 4-Block Structure]]([link])
- [[CWS-STD-002: Document Keying]]([link])
- [[CWS-STD-003: Documentation Standards]]([link])
